biotools.summary:
R package for Distinguishing among modes of convergent adaptation using population genomic data.

Distinguishing among modes of convergent adaptation using population genomic data.


This is the source code page for an R package implementing methods presented in Lee and Coop (2017). 
A fully worked example for how to use DMC can be found at dmc_example.md.
